document_data.mainbody:
oad was a flowering plant found in the jungles of Chult in southwest Faer√ªn.
Leaves of the woad plant were used in the creation of common Chultan blue and emerald dyes. Another use for woad plants was workmans oil. Woad leaves were infused with Chultan tea, senna, and spring water to produce a pleasant tasting curative drink that alleviated several common afflictions.
Some Thayan women used blue woad dye to tattoo their heads with. One such person with decorative blue tattoos was Dahlia Sinfelle, a one-time servant of Szass Tam in the 15 century DR.
